name: The Sins Awakening
description:
Defeat the Seven Deadly Sins and save your land!

In a land devastated by the return of the Seven Deadly Sins, there are still humans who hope for a better future, and are ready to fight.

Now it's your turn to challenge the Sins. Pick either Ater, a veteran soldier, or Alba, a young student, and defeat the Sins once again.

Features:
  • 2 different characters, each with his own story and abilities
  • 7 increasingly difficult stages to make your way through
  • 15 music tracks and lots of sound effects to achieve the best gaming experience
  • Scoring mechanics geared towards rewarding risk-taking players
Credits:
  • Michele Ferraro - Programming, Graphics
  • Brian Binning - Music, Sound Effects
